channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Maine’s governor demands data on immigration arrests as fear spreads amid enforcement surge
Microsoft investigating outage affecting Microsoft 365, Outlook
item.description: Microsoft services are down for thousands of users, according to tracking service Downdetector.

item.title: House voting on final funding measures to avoid partial shutdown
item.description: The House is voting Thursday on the remaining bills to fund the government as the deadline to avoid another shutdown nears.
